affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150 / 200
MOVEMENT SPEED CHANGE: 8% / 12% / 16% / 20%
DURATION: 7
cmb:
MANA COST: 130/140/150/160
COOLDOWN: 16
desc: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
notes:
Slows magic immune units.
There is a 2 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.
lore: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
name: spectre_spectral_dagger

desc: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero with no nearby allied units.
notes:
Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.
Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.
lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
name: spectre_desolate

attrib:
MIN RADIUS: 300 / 300 / 300 / 300
MAX RADIUS: 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000
DAMAGE REFLECTED: 10% / 14% / 18% / 22%
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
notes:
The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre.
Illusions don't get this ability.
lore: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
name: spectre_dispersion

desc: Spectre physically possesses a chosen Haunt.
lore: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.
name: spectre_reality

attrib:
DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7
INCOMING DAMAGE: 100% / 100% / 100%
OUTGOING DAMAGE: 30%
cmb:
MANA COST: 150/150/150
COOLDOWN: 120
desc:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to take the place of a given illusion.
Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.
notes:
Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, move at 400 base movement speed, and cannot be disabled.
There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.
lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
name: spectre_haunt
